description: Sum of digits of n-th triangular number.
links: Robert Israel, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
maple: P:=proc(n) local a,i,k,w; a:=0; for i from 1 by 1 to n do a:=a+i; w:=0; k:=a; while k>0 do w:=w+k-(trunc(k/10)*10); k:=trunc(k/10); od; print(w); od; end: P(100); # _Paolo P. Lava_, May 03 2007seq(convert(convert(n*(n+1)/2,base,10),`+`), n=0..100); # _Robert Israel_, Jun 18 2015
prog: (MAGMA) [&+Intseq(n*(n+1) div 2): n in [0..80] ]; // _Vincenzo Librandi_, Jun 18 2015(PARI) a(n) = sumdigits(n*(n+1)/2); \\ _Michel Marcus_, Jun 18 2015
author: _N. J. A. Sloane_
